events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected, and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to customer dissatisfaction with the received product.
Customer support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund case for this customer.
Hello! This is Emily from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund and Iâ€™m here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and reason for the refund so I can process your request properly?
The order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the item was completely different from the description on your website.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order and provide a prepaid shipping label to return the item.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the refund offer and the return label. Looking forward to a smooth process.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You will receive the return shipping label shortly via email.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the return label and that the refund process met your expectations.
Since we have not heard back from you and the refund is complete, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
